oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relay-free sliding mode control technique based power system stabilizer for single machine infinite bus system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANDAL, VITTHAL
BANDYOPADHYAY, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sliding mode control
buses
dynamic response
system stability
breeder reactor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper presents a new method for design of power system stabilizer (PSS) based on relay-free sliding mode control technique. The control objective is to enhance the stability and to improve the dynamic response of the single machine infinite bus (SMIB) system. We apply this relay-free sliding mode controller to design power system stabilizer for demonstrating the availability of the proposed approach.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the American Control Conference, New York, NY, USA, 9-13 July 2007, 5922-5927
